name: Lost In The Mountain (chakibehappy)
description:
The exploration game about Search and Rescue, you have to save all the lost climber in the ice cold mountain area.

CREDIT

Animation from mixamo

Software : Unity, Makehuman, Blender, Photoshop, Audacity
